name: Orblitz
description: Orblitz is a casual game that is great for winding down or just passing time.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0 Ghz Processor Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 85 MB available space Additional Notes: Orblitz does not require an exceptional machine to run smoothly.
